articles.content:
Greetings to third Kimilsungia show 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Megawati Sukarnoptri, vice-president of Indonesia, sent a message of greetings to the third Kimilsungia show held on the occasion of Sun's Day, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The message wished the show a success and said that Kimilsungia is an everlasting symbol of friendship between the two peoples.    
 It expressed hope that the show would strengthen the cooperative relations between the two countries in the mutual interests of the two peoples.

articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Il Sung's statue from Palestinian President 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- President of the State of Palestine Yasser Arafat sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang on the occasion of Sun's Day.
 Palestinian ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed Abdlah and embassy officials laid the floral basket before the statue of Kim Il Sung on April 15 and made a bow.
